    • Constructor Detail

      • Screen

        public Screen​(java.lang.String name,
              java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> rawMap,
              java.util.HashMap<Enemy,​int[]> enemies,
              Block background,
              java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Block> blocks,
              java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> adjacentScreens,
              ImageGenerator imgGen,
              DungeonWorld world)
        creates a new screen.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the screen
        rawMap - the raw map of blocks (as strings)
        enemies - all enemies present on this screen
        background - the background tile, if any blocks get destroyed
        blocks - a list of all blocks available to load
        adjacentScreens - a map of adjacent screens
        imgGen - an image generator for connected textures
        world - the world for generation noise purposes

    • Method Detail

                                                                      ImageGenerator imgGen,
                                                                      DungeonWorld world)
        compiles a raw map into a map
        Parameters:
        rawMap - map of blocks as strings
        blocks - all blocks available to load
        imgGen - image generator for connected textures
        world - the world for generation noise purposes
        Returns:
        returns a map of blocks

      • load

        public void load​(DungeonWorld world)
        loads the screen onto the world
        Parameters:
        world - world the screen gets generated on
